name: Find It Fast! Seek and find hidden objects
name_original: Find It Fast! Seek and find hidden objects
description:
Find It Fast! is a time killer game in which you need to seek and find the item for each round!

The game principle is simple: Find the hidden objects in the scene! But wait! You will have to be fast before the time runs out. Finding hidden objects is more immersive than ever in Find It Fast!

You can use hints that will show you the location of an item from the scene. However, these hints are limited so use them carefully!
Beware of the time limit! To more you progress, the less time you'll have

Perfect for a casual play or to kill time while waiting for the dentist!
Fun for all ages, everyone and their cat can play!

FEATURES
- Challenging time killer game
- A seek and find game with a twist!
- Find who's the best on the Game Center Leaderboard!
- Colorful vivid game design
- Great music and sound effects
